Title: Relates to authorizing the creation of an air rights database for the city of New York
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of the New York city department of finance to create an air rights database recording transfers of such unused development rights.
LawCode: Add ยง11-203.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to recording interests in air rights
